    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class StreamsMergeTask
extends BaseStreamsTask
    NOT USED. When joins/partions are implemented, a similar pattern could be followed. Done only as basic proof of concept. NEEDS TO BE RE-WRITTEN
